comments_since_last_sample.body: I think I've never seen this much dedication to just one video, that's just incredible.
I know full damn well if anyone will find anything weirder, more unnecessary and even more ambitious, it’s gonna be uncle Derek.

The N64DD really was ahead of its time.
I believe you could even share gameplay video (possibly stream as well).
16:30 "write something on the bread" "for some reason the model doesn't run fast...isn't it?" yeah Definitely a Bad translation Google
